text: sing thi xyu nı brrda chan fa læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen siththi khx ngxallxhˌ læa tha hak phwk cea peidphey sing thi xyu nı cı khxng phwk cea hrux pkpid man wi ktam xallxhˌ ca thrng na sing nan ma chara sxbswn kæ phwk cea læw phraxngkh ca thrng xphaythosʹ kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng dechanuphaph henux thuksingthukxyang
